Map of Activities

This map (code: mbon_activities_map() in functions.R) so far is a quick mockup of data combined from these sources:

  • Map of MBON Activities - Upload Form
    source & files: mbon-cross - Google Drive
    code: process_uploads.R → p2p.geojson

  • Search for “MBON” - GOOS BioEco GeoNode
    GOOS Biology and Ecosystems GeoNode
    code: process_goosocean.R → sbc.geojson, sfl.geojson
